title: Rhythmic Gymnastics
brief_description: The sport of Rhythmic Gymnastics has been popular in Europe for many generations and is rapidly becoming increasingly popular throughout the United States. The sport is both fun and challenging for the participants, and its visual beauty appeals to spectators. This video, aimed at gymnastic instructors covers such aspects of the sport as Safety, Warm-up, Basic Movement without Equipment, Basic Movement with Equipment and Skills with Apparatus and demonstrates basic exercises while using the apparatus.
